name: Eyes Wide Shut
tagline: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

name: Snake Eyes
tagline: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

name: God's Not Dead
tagline: College philosophy professor Mr. Radisson's curriculum is challenged by his new student, Josh, who believes God exists.

name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
tagline: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

name: Never Say Never Again
tagline: A SPECTRE agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

name: Alien³
tagline: Ripley continues to be stalked by a savage alien, after her escape pod crashes on a prison planet.

name: Never Been Kissed
tagline: A journalist enrolls in her old highschool as part of her research for a story.

name: What Dreams May Come
tagline: After dying in a car crash a man searches the afterlife for his wife.

name: The Haunting in Connecticut
tagline: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary.

name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
tagline: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

name: Why Did I Get Married?
tagline: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

name: Saw
tagline: With a dead body lying between them, two men wake up in the secure lair of a serial killer who's been nicknamed "Jigsaw". The men must follow various rules and objectives if they wish to survive and win the deadly game set for them.

name: I Am Number Four
tagline: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

name: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
tagline: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

name: Don't Say a Word
tagline: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

name: The Guardian
tagline: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

name: Spawn
tagline: A mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

name: The Jackal
tagline: An imprisoned IRA sniper is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

name: Doc Hollywood
tagline: A young doctor causes a traffic accident in a small town and is sentenced to work for some days at the town hospital.

name: Ordinary People
tagline: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

name: This Means War
tagline: Two top CIA operatives wage an epic battle against one another after they discover they are dating the same woman.

name: Project X
tagline: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.

name: Starship Troopers
tagline: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

name: Source Code
tagline: An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.

name: The Omen
tagline: A remake of the 1976 horror classic The Omen (1976), an American official realizes that his young son may literally be the devil incarnate.

name: Crash
tagline: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

name: New Year's Eve
tagline: The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.

name: The Woman in Black
tagline: A young lawyer travels to a remote village where he discovers the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.

name: Evil Dead
tagline: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival.

name: The Count of Monte Cristo
tagline: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge

name: The Abyss
tagline: A civilian diving team are enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

name: La Bamba
tagline: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and the Big Bopper.

name: The Blues Brothers
tagline: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

name: TMNT
tagline: The continued adventures of the four adolescent mutated turtles gifted in the art of the ninja, as they attempt to stop a mysterious evil that threatens to end the world.

name: Final Destination 3

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 1 KG

tagline: In this third installment of the Final Destination series, a student's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a lucky few, but not from death itself which seeks out those who escaped their fate.

name: The Verdict
tagline: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

name: Insidious
tagline: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

name: Small Soldiers
tagline: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

name: Paranormal Activity 4
tagline: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.

name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
tagline: A 1960s hipster secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

name: Tin Cup
tagline: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

name: Paycheck
tagline: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.

name: Rambo III
tagline: Rambo's Vietnam commanding officer Colonel Trautman is held hostage in Afghanistan, and its up to Rambo to rescue him.

name: P.S. I Love You
tagline: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

name: Hero
tagline: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

name: Rookie of the Year
tagline: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

name: 3:10 to Yuma
tagline: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

name: Problem Child
tagline: A young boy is just short of a monster. He is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.

name: Sabrina
tagline: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

name: RoboCop
tagline: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

name: Yours, Mine & Ours
tagline: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widow handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of her 10 and his 8 children.

name: Life as We Know It
tagline: Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.

name: Beethoven's 2nd
tagline: Beethoven the St. Bernard dog becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dog-napped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

name: Corpse Bride
tagline: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

name: Final Destination
tagline: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

name: Sleepers
tagline: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized; over 10 years later, they get their chance for revenge.

name: Papillon
tagline: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

name: The Devil Inside
tagline: In Italy, a woman becomes involved in a series of unauthorized exorcisms during her mission to discover what happened to her mother, who allegedly murdered three people during her own exorcism.

name: RED 2
tagline: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

name: Arachnophobia
tagline: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

name: The Prestige
tagline: The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.

name: Letters to Juliet
tagline: Sophie dreams of becoming a writer and travels to Verona, Italy where she meets the "Secretaries of Juliet".

name: Blow
tagline: The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.

name: My Cousin Vinny
tagline: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
tagline: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett. Based on the hit Broadway musical.

name: Forces of Nature
tagline: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

name: Message in a Bottle
tagline: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

name: The Recruit
tagline: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

name: Unfaithful
tagline: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
tagline: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
tagline: Back in middle school after summer vacation, Greg Heffley and his older brother Rodrick must deal with their parents' misguided attempts to have them bond.

name: King Kong
tagline: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

name: Kicking & Screaming
tagline: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating...

name: The Strangers
tagline: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.

name: Tyler Perry's A Madea Christmas
tagline: Madea dispenses her unique form of holiday spirit on rural town when she's coaxed into helping a friend pay her daughter a surprise visit in the country for Christmas.

name: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
tagline: Now out of prison but still disgraced by his peers, Gordon Gekko works his future son-in-law, an idealistic stock broker, when he sees an opportunity to take down a Wall Street enemy and rebuild his empire.

name: Blade: Trinity
tagline: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula

name: The Royal Tenenbaums
tagline: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when one of their member announces he has a terminal illness.

name: The Lake House
tagline: A lonely doctor who once occupied an unusual lakeside home begins exchanging love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.

name: The Color of Money
tagline: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

name: Stand by Me
tagline: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

name: Radio
tagline: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man whom he took under his wing.

name: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
tagline: A bachelor is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends at his younger brother's wedding.

name: Awakenings
tagline: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

name: South Park: Bigger Longer & Uncut
tagline: When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance & Phillip, they are pronounced "corrupted", and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.

name: Predators
tagline: A group of elite warriors are hunted by members of a merciless alien race known as Predators.

name: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
tagline: An ambitious married woman's temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness, and forever alters the course of her life.

name: King Arthur
tagline: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

name: The Call
tagline: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

name: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
tagline: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

name: Funny People
tagline: When seasoned comedian George Simmons learns of his terminal, inoperable health condition, his desire to form a genuine friendship cause him to take a relatively green performer under his wing as his opening act.

name: Footloose
tagline: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

name: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
tagline: As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.

name: Finding Forrester
tagline: A young writing prodigy finds a mentor in a reclusive author.
